name: Kumo
title: kumo.ai
shortDescription: Kumo leverages AI to enhance relational data handling, ideal for businesses with complex data structures. By eliminating the need for feature engineering, Kumo allows companies to deploy AI models quickly, enhancing predictions and embeddings directly from relational databases. An example use case is improving lead scoring models which significantly increase conversion rates.
pros: Fast model deployment (20x faster than traditional methods)
High accuracy in predictions and embeddings

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: TensorFlow
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Popular for building custom AI models

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: PyTorch
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Flexible and powerful for AI research
